Pawnmorph.ListedBackstoryDef.title: former celebrity chef
Pawnmorph.ListedBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] used to own his own 5-star restaurant until he a fateful event in which he yelled at an apprentice chef over lamb sauce. In response, the apprentice slipped some ovine mutagen into the dish he was served, leading to the sudden transformation of chef into ram. [PAWN_nameDef] was then shoved into a cryptosleep pod and set adrift into the galaxy. Eventually, he landed on a distant rimworld, and sought to begin his new life.

Pawnmorph.ListedBackstoryDef.title: chaothrumbo
Pawnmorph.ListedBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was transformed into a titanic chaomorph known as a chaothrumbo.
